comment.author: 12814971@N00
comment._content: Utah is currently visible as a wreck on the west side of Ford Island, Pearl Harbor. She was no longer an active battleship on December 7, 1941, but probably looked like one from the air, took some torpedoes, and sank.

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: These unposed pictures of a moment in the life of a ship are to me always much more interesting than 'posed' pictures. Sailors, especially on the old ships, were not always clean and shiny.
